metadata.title: Wednesday, 31st March, 2021
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) when the rehabilitation of feeder roads in Ngabwe District will commence;
(b) what the estimated cost of the project is;
(c) what the time frame for the completion of the project is; and
(d) who the contractor for the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Youth, Sport and Child Development
parts: (a) how many youths in Keembe Parliamentary Constituency benefited from the Youth Empowerment Fund from 2018 to 2020, year by year;
(b) which projects were approved for funding;
(c) if no youths benefited from the Fund, why; and
(d) when the youths in Keembe will be considered for empowerment.
